PERSONA:
thomas is a 70-year-old white, non-hispanic man living in a metropolitan area in the northeast region of the united states, specifically in the middle atlantic division. he has a high school education or less and was born in the u.s.

thomas is a married roman catholic, though he never attends religious services. he identifies as a very conservative republican and is registered to vote at his current address. despite his age, he uses the internet about once a day.

financially, thomas falls into the upper income bracket, earning $100,000 or more annually. however, he does not engage in any volunteer work.

overall, thomas is a retired, affluent, and politically conservative individual who maintains a relatively simple lifestyle in his golden years, preferring to stay informed through regular internet use rather than involving himself in community activities.
